procedure.title: To suspend and resume a server
procedure.para: Administrative users might want to suspend an infrequently used instance or to perform system maintenance.

step.para: When you suspend an instance, its VM state is stored on disk, all memory is written to disk, and the virtual machine is stopped. Suspending an instance is similar to placing a device in hibernation; memory and vCPUs become available.
